title: bitbollo
author: bitbollo
created_time: November 30, 2023, 06:40:26 AMLast edit: December 05, 2023, 11:35:32 PM by bitbollo
content: THE ART ON "CINDERELLA"ArtiKanDo Collection  We (me and giammangiato) have decided to give away the full sheet  numbered 12/20 to a forum member!I would like to take this opportunity to thank you all for your passion in making this section and this hobby interesting.Cryptoverse 12/20 full sheet  Simply rules:- No RANDOM !- Member or above- Reply here with your spot selection (one spot per account).  - Up to 2 spots if you have a deal with me (edit: anytime!)- No alt accounts / red trust- The last 2 numbers will be selected (00-50)- I can refuse participants. (people caught using multi account etc etc..... )- A bitcoin block will be selected once the raffle is full or I will choose before one randomShipping from ITALY - EU - On Mid/End December. Tracked/Registered. Free nothing to pay.List of participants00 DabsPoorVersion01 krogothmanhattan02 krogothmanhattan03 Danydee04 haloxon05 5tift06 shasan07 haloxon08 Buchi-8809 Steeley10 MoparMiningLLC11 BABY SHOES12 YodasRedRocket13 Geophphreigh14 PeakDK15 blckhawk16 Gaukler17 pinggoki18 Mbitr19 Danydee20 mx12art21 MoparMiningLLC22 julerz1223 hopenotlate24 anonymousminer25 aoluain2627 tldr-hodl28 Mortare29 Doblezero30 F2b31 bct_ail32 NeuroticFish33 Crytocanuk34 hotdog735 markinaz36 Bitdaryl37 Remsjack38 CARIBBEAN TREASURES39 tread9340 Asuspawer0941 tweetious42 tweetious43 Becassine44 Fillippone45 Dernoste46 Mbitr47 Rtrident48 Koal-8449 JanEmil50 aoluain

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: 21 - MoparMiningLLC - thanks!!!I am not sure what you mean by have a deal with you - like currently or in the past? we have dealt in the past and if that counts, can I have #10 for my second spot - if not, totally understand!

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on November 30, 2023, 06:49:12 AM21 - MoparMiningLLC - thanks!!!choose a second one please.edit:Yes, whether done recently or in recent years it's ok(more or less I remember the various deals... in any case I check DM and trust).Thanks for the second spot.

comments.body: 15 - blckhawkI am not exactly sure what this prize is but I hope that I can join and win it. It looks like a stamp to me but a cool one. Good luck to everyone joining.
